DOC.brief_summary: To determine safety , tolerability , drug absorption profile multiple IV dose BLI 489 healthy subject .
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluate Whether BLI-489 Can Safely Tolerated Healthy Subjects Given Multiple Doses
DOC.criteria: Men woman nonchildbearing potential ( WONCBP ) age 18 50 year inclusive screening ; Body mass index ( BMI ) range 18 32 kg/m2 body weight â‰¥50 kg . ; Healthy determine investigator basis screen evaluation ; Calculated creatinine clearance within normal limit use CockcroftGault formula ; Nonsmoker smoker few 10 cigarette per day determine history , smoker must able abstain smoking inpatient stay ; Have high probability compliance completion study . Presence history disorder may prevent successful completion study ; Any significant cardiovascular , hepatic , renal , respiratory , gastrointestinal , endocrine , immunologic , dermatologic , hematologic , neurologic , psychiatric disease ; Any surgical medical condition may interfere distribution , metabolism , excretion investigational product ; Acute disease state ( eg , nausea , vomit , fever , diarrhea ) within 7 day study day 1 ; History drug abuse within 1 year study day 1 ; Admitted alcohol abuse history alcohol use may interfere subject 's ability comply protocol requirement .
